attributes.action: Explain why the opprtunity of a referendum was not given to the UKcitizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
apart from your standard reply that this was not necessary,why was you afraid that the result may have been
the  same as the Irish one.
Otherwise you would allowed it.
Your attitude to this and other issues are arrogant and penultimate.
You lack communication with the UK electorate ,which will be reflected in the next General Election
